content: grindstone tote bag crochet pattern by tara briggs @taralovescrochet grindstone tote bag - july 2021 - downeast collection - @taralovescrochet basic information pattern is written in us crochet terms yarn approximately 470 yards of bernat maker home decrease or other bulky 5 weight yarn the bag can be made with any sturdy yarn worsted weight 4 will give you a smaller bag while super bulky 6 will give you a larger bag yardage will vary based on yarn chosen see last 2 pages of pattern for tester photos yarns and yardage hook two hooks - one larger and one 1mm smaller i used 7mm and 6mm with bernat maker home decrease choose hooks that give you a tight gauge on the side panel and a slightly looser gauge on the front/back panels you will need 6 locking stitch markers for assembly safety pins make a great substitute finished size varies based on yarn chosen gauge for bernat maker home decrease - approximately 10 sts by 6 row = 4 front/back panels and 8 sts by 5 row = 2 side panel/strap gauge will vary depending on yarn chosen abbreviations and symbols chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet chain space - chain space decrease - single_crochet 2 together skip - skip decrease st - stitch 2dc - 2 double_crochet in the same stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase single_crochet - single_crochet * * - repeat this section grindstone tote bag - july 2021 - downeast collection - @taralovescrochet notes - bag is made with two nearly identical front/back panels and the strap and side/bottom panels are worked as one piece - chain 2 at the beginning of the row does not count as a stitch - row 4 8 and repeats use a crossed double_crochet stitch you will skip one stitch and then make a double_crochet in the next stitch as normal then work a second double_crochet into the skipped stitch when working into skipped stitches cross in front of the previous stitch pattern front/back panels make 2 with 7mm hook or larger hook row 1 chain 30 2dc in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet across until 1 chain remains 2dc in last chain 30 row 2 chain 2 turn 2dc in 1st st *chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet 1* across until 1 st remains 2dc in last st 32 row 3 chain 2 turn 2dc in 1st st double_crochet across placing a double_crochet in every st and chain space until 1 st remains 2dc in last st 34 row 4 chain 2 turn 2dc in 1st st *skip 1 st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in skip st* across until 1 st remains 2dc in last st 36 row 5 chain 2 turn 2dc in 1st st double_crochet across until 1 st remains 2dc in last st 38 row 6 chain 2 turn double_crochet in 1st st *chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet 1* across until 1 st remains double_crochet in last st 38 row 7 chain 2 turn double_crochet in every st and
